tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE replication_disaster_recovery (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_server VARCHAR(255),
  destination_server VARCHAR(255),
  replication_method VARCHAR(100),
  replication_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE replication_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	data VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE backup_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	backup_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	backup_date DATE NOT NULL
)
